entry.summary:
Observed at: North Mountain 4:00 AM ADT Wednesday 12 April 2023
Temperature: 5.2°C
Humidity: 71 %
Dewpoint: 0.5°C
Wind: WSW 23 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of rain beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Flurries over higher terrain in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 11 April 2023
